idea-plugin.change-notes: <html><dl> <dt>1.5.1</dt> <dd>generate buildspec.mk to apply persistent build settings</dd> <dt>1.5.0</dt> <dd>restore latest selected item when project is opened</dd> <dd>fix mm build action in menu</dd> <dt>1.4.4</dt> <dd>fix broken mm function</dd> <dd>strip clang color code in build output when cyanogenmod build</dd> <dd>enable ccache as default</dd> <dd>fix to handle build menu action</dd> <dd>fix to handle mProductOut directory</dd> <dt>1.4.3</dt> <dd>fix build output process</dd> <dd>initial cyanogenmod build support</dd> <dt>1.4.2</dt> <dd>fix to handle mProductOut directory</dd> <dt>1.4.1</dt> <dd>plugin now supports idea 14.0</dd> <dd>handle IOException while run executable</dd> <dt>1.4.0</dt> <dd>use gradle build system</dd> <dd>port core api to kotlin</dd> <dd>exclude out directories automatically</dd> <dd>kill build and sync processes when close project</dd> <dd>fix save bug when start to build</dd> <dt>1.3.0</dt> <dd>initial public release</dd> </dl></html>
